name: FastFWD
description:
FastFWD is a lighthearted character-focused cyberpunk precision puzzle platformer in which the player takes the role of Devon, a new hire at SMail: a failing email delivery company, and must speedrun their way through the internet landscape delivering emails as fast as possible. 

We think you'll really like it!

CREDITS ARTISTS

Lillian Hong
Kelly Wang

PROGRAMMERS

Jay Idema
Jack McDaid
Kelly Wang

PRODUCER

LEVEL DESIGNER

WRITER

Will  -  John McDaid
